dcterms:creator: Filipa Lino
Carlos Santiago
Manuel Marques
dcterms:description: BlendMimic3D is a synthetic dataset designed to benchmark 3D human pose estimation (HPE) in occluded scenarios. It includes diverse multi-camera scenarios with various types of occlusions, such as self, object-based, and out-of-frame occlusions, making it a valuable tool for training and evaluating HPE models.
dcterms:title: BlendMimic3D

dcterms:creator: Catalin Ionescu
Dragos Papava
Vlad Olaru
Cristian Sminchisescu
dcterms:description: Human3.6M is a large-scale dataset that provides 3.6 million human poses and corresponding images, captured in controlled indoor environments. It documents 15 unique actions from multiple viewpoints, serving as a foundational dataset for training various 3D human pose estimation algorithms.
dcterms:title: Human3.6M

dcterms:creator: Gul Varol
Javier Romero
Xavier Martin
Naureen Mahmood
Michael J. Black
Ivan Laptev
Cordelia Schmid
dcterms:description: SURREAL is a synthetic dataset designed for learning from synthetic humans, providing a variety of scenarios for 3D human pose estimation. It is particularly useful for training models in diverse and complex environments.
dcterms:title: SURREAL

dcterms:creator: Hanbyul Joo
Hao Liu
Lei Tan
Lin Gui
Bart Nabbe
Iain Matthews
Takeo Kanade
Shohei Nobuhara
Yaser Sheikh
dcterms:description: CMU Panoptic is a dataset that captures social motion in a massively multiview system, providing a rich source of data for multi-person pose estimation and interaction analysis.
dcterms:title: CMU Panoptic

dcterms:creator: Anurag Arnab
Carl Doersch
Andrew Zisserman
dcterms:description: 3DPW is a dataset that exploits temporal context for 3D human pose estimation in the wild, providing a diverse set of scenarios for evaluating pose estimation algorithms.
dcterms:title: 3DPW

dcterms:creator: Priyanka Patel
Chun-Hao P. Huang
Joachim Tesch
David T. Hoffmann
Shashank Tripathi
Michael J. Black
dcterms:description: AGORA is a dataset designed for avatars in geography optimized for regression analysis, providing a unique perspective on human pose estimation in geographical contexts.
dcterms:title: AGORA

dcterms:creator: Michael J. Black
Priyanka Patel
Joachim Tesch
Jinlong Yang
dcterms:description: BEDLAM is a synthetic dataset of bodies exhibiting detailed lifelike animated motion, aimed at enhancing the training of 3D human pose and shape estimation models.
dcterms:title: BEDLAM

dcterms:creator: Tsung-Yi Lin
Michael Maire
Serge Belongie
James Hays
Pietro Perona
Deva Ramanan
Piotr Doll√°r
C Lawrence Zitnick
dcterms:description: COCO is a large-scale dataset that provides a rich set of images with annotations for common objects in context, widely used for various computer vision tasks including human pose estimation.
dcterms:title: COCO
